This module implements helper procedures used in generation.

Imports

../misc

Types

GenerateError = object of CatchableError
Exception in generation.

Procs

func split(rng: var Rand; total: Natural; chunkCount: Positive;
           allowZeroChunk: bool): seq[int] {.inline, ...raises: [GenerateError],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Splits the number total into chunkCount chunks. If splitting fails, GenerateError is raised.

Example:

import std/[math, random, sequtils]

var rng = 123.initRand
let numbers = rng.split(10, 3, false)
assert numbers.sum == 10
assert numbers.len == 3
assert numbers.allIt it > 0
func split(rng: var Rand; total: Natural; ratios: openArray[Option[Natural]]): seq[
    int] {.inline, ...raises: [GenerateError], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Splits the number total into chunks following the probabilistic distribution represented by ratios. ratios can contain none to specify a random positive ratio, and cannot contain anything but none and some(0) when doing so. If all elements in ratios are all some(0), splits randomly. If splitting fails, GenerateError is raised.

Example:

import std/[options, random]

var rng = 123.initRand
let numbers = rng.split(10, [some Natural 2, some Natural 3])
assert numbers == @[4, 6]
